title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
1. Gather and document the detailed requirements for the AIRealEstateAnalyzer tool, including specific features (e.g., trend analysis, property value prediction with historical data of up to 5 years), data sources (real estate market data, historical sales data, economic indicators like inflation rate, unemployment rate, etc.), expected outputs (visualizations, reports, notifications), target users (real estate agents, investors, home buyers), performance requirements (processing speed: under 1 minute for analysis of a single property, accuracy: at least 85%, security considerations (data privacy, protection against threats such as data breaches and unauthorized access), scalability (ability to handle large datasets), maintainability (ease of updating or adding new features), and any other relevant constraints or assumptions. Include error handling mechanisms for unexpected inputs or failures.

2. Prepare a comprehensive document detailing the project scope, requirements, and design considerations for review by team members and potential stakeholders. The document should be structured in a clear and concise manner, making it easy to understand and navigate for all readers.
3. Include mockups or wireframes where necessary to illustrate the user interface. Consider using interactive prototypes to demonstrate the functionality of the tool.
4. Collaborate with team members during the review process, address feedback, and iteratively improve the document until it is finalized. Ensure that all stakeholders are kept informed about progress and changes made.
5. Upon finalization, conduct a pilot test with a small group of users to gather feedback and make necessary adjustments before rolling out the tool to a wider audience.
6. Once the tool is ready for deployment, collaborate with DevOps team to ensure smooth and secure implementation.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data pipeline, machine learning models, and user interfaces.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment tools.

title: Implement Data Ingestion Pipeline
description: Develop the data ingestion pipeline to collect and preprocess real estate data from various sources.

title: Develop Machine Learning Models
description: Implement and train machine learning models to analyze real estate trends and predict property value fluctuations.

title: Build User Interfaces
description: Develop user interfaces for data visualization, model training, and property value prediction.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system is secure by implementing appropriate security measures, such as data encryption, access controls, and vulnerability testing.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans to ensure the system meets the defined requirements and functions as expected.

title: Deploy and Monitor the System
description: Deploy the AIRealEstateAnalyzer tool to a production environment and set up monitoring and logging systems.

title: Write Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.
